description:
Noraneko (stray cat) is a mysterious white stray cat that is often appearing beside Train but doesn`t get noticed by anybody save for Train himself.
It does also make an appearence in http://anidb.net/cr2985 [Yabuki Kentarou]`s other manga/anime series http://anidb.net/a5625 [To Love-Ru], where it stares as http://anidb.net/ch11892 [Magical Kyouko]`s animal sidekick, Shirone.
name: Noraneko
